scripts.build: npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix backend
scripts.loc: find backend frontend -type f \( -name '*.js' -o -name '*.jsx' -o -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.tsx' -o -name '*.mjs' -o -name '*.cjs' -o -name '*.css' -o -name '*.html' -o -name '*.sql' -o -name '*.prisma' \) ! -path '*/node_modules/*' ! -path '*/dist/*' ! -path '*/build/*' ! -path '*/coverage/*' ! -path '*/public/*' -print0 | xargs -0 wc -l | tail -n 1
